tool_description: URL Shortener with free QR Code generation, tracking features and more. Backed by ultra fast CDN and Hosting.
name: URL Shortener
title: URL Shortener

api_list.name: short-urls/{code}/visits
api_list.description: Shows clicks, referer, etc. for a specific short link.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortener25.p.rapidapi.com/short-urls/j95Aj/visits"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortener25.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortener25.p.rapidapi.com/short-urls"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortener25.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
